text: Twirlywoos is an educational children's television series that uses a hybrid of live action and stop-motion animation. The series was created by Shaun Johnson and Bill Banks, the series aired by CBeebies on 23 February 2015, it was produced by Ragdoll Productions and WildBrain Studios. It was directed by Vito Bruno and Steve Roberts all episodes admitted. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Series 1 (2015)=== ===Series 2 (2015–2016)=== ===Series 3 (2016–2017) === ===Series 4 (2017)=== Twirlywoos
